Work Order Viewer: Previously, the Work Order Purchases Tab always displayed the incorrect quantities Received and Vouchered for a general item received on a change order, even if the items had been received. In this release, the quantities Received and Vouchered are always displayed correctly.

9.1.611.060 (2022-02-02)

Accounts Payable

 AP Check: This custom registry does the following for AP Check: 
1.    Move "pay to the order of" text value up two lines
2.    Remove the bold from the "Pay to the order of" value displayed
3.    Move the "date" and "amount" values up one line
4.    Always display two asterisks before the dollar amount

Service Management 

Dispatch Board viewer: The SAMPro Dispatch Board "uncompleted" filter now includes "Manager Review," which is listed as a filtered tech status.

New Call Viewer: When the Web Log references more than one work order, the dispatch comments are left blank. Before, the new web log would provide dispatcher comments from the first work order referenced in the web log

System

Reporting: When searching terms on a report, the select search terms font color is now a darker green, for better readability.

TechAnywhere

TechAnywhere: When a technician submits a quote for approval, the email subject will have the technician Id of the person who created the quote in the subject line of the email.

9.1.611.060 (2022-01-25)

Client Order Processing 

COP Customization: This is a customized report includes an updated v.cus file that encompasses the ability for a bitmap on the COP Quote form and adds the ability (via registry) to specify a Job Cost Code to be used to override the Work Order Default Job Cost Code when TechAnywhere posts inventory line items to the WO Inventory child tab.

Invoicing

Report Line Edit Overrides: This report provides a new format for the service invoice reports. This format matches the existing FORMAT_11, with the following alterations:
•    Replace the label "Work Order Id" with "Conserv Ref No:"
•    Replace the label "P.O. #"  with "CK Work Order:"
•    Replace the "@" signs on all line items with "X"
•    Remove the "$" from all lines
•    Remove the "%" from all lines

Payroll

Compute PR: This update resolves an issue with the Job Cost posting the regular rate instead of the BLENDED rate when an employee has accumulated over time. Before, posting to GL correctly used the BLENDED rate but posting to JobCost used the REGULAR rate from the employee record.

Labor Journal viewer: In this update, the WO ID on the labor lines from the labor journal does not re-load or overwrite the TA source RN when changing the WO Id so that the TA source RN carries over to new transactions. Overriding the WO Id was caused by changing the WO ID on some of the technician labor journal lines because it was created for the wrong client site.

Service Management

New Call viewer: This update provides reminders for past due payments for invoices made via the NewCall COD Job's setup. When users create a work order via the Create New COD Sites feature in New Call, the Past Due warning messages appear if their client didn’t pay upon delivery. 

Work Order viewer: This patch corrects an issue where manual adjustments to the Work Order Revenue Adjustments tab's Rate field did not properly update the Amount field the Rate included a percentage point.  The patch corrects this by copying the Rate field before dividing by 100 to prevent truncation of decimal points.

9.1.611.059 Avalara 

Avalara Report

This report provides a new format for the service invoice reports. This format matches the existing FORMAT_11, with the following alterations:
•    Replace the label "Work Order Id" with "Conserv Ref No:"
•    Replace the label "P.O. #"  with "CK Work Order:"
•    Replace the "@" signs on all line items with "X"
•    Remove the "$" from all lines
•    Remove the "%" from all lines

9.1.611.059AVAg (2022-04-27)

System

Viewers (general): Previously, when a user ran the Quote Approval Wizard for a quote where a PO needs to be generated, it would result in an error. This update corrects that defect. 

9.1.611.059AVAf (2022-04-21)

System

Viewers (general): This update corrects a defect preventing users from being able to use the "Copy Quote Scope" functionality on all new and existing Quotes, throwing an error when a user clicked the Copy Quote Scope button.

9.1.611.059AVAe (2022-04-14)

Purchasing

Purchase Order viewer: This update corrects a defect where the Purchase Order allowed references to the same Inventory Item Id on multiple lines.

System

Viewers (general): This update corrects a defect when saving a receipt in the ‘Purchase Order Receipts’ would produce a warning alert box. The warning message erroneously appeared as the receipt would save regardless of the warning message.

Quote

Avalara: This update improves quote processing performance and corrects a defect where the tax would not populate. 

9.1.611.059AVAd (2022-03-31)

DBAnalytics

Avalara: This update disallows users from attempting to utilize a SAMPro viewer from DBAnalytics during an executing process. When a user attempts to utilize a process when it is currently functioning, an alert will display “This function cannot be used while the function is executing.”

Service Management

Work Order viewer:  This update gives users the option of having the sort logs on work orders by most recent or by oldest to newest. This is an update to another case which sorted work orders by most recent without having to implement a registry.

9.1.611.059AVAc (2022-03-29)

Invoicing

Service Invoicing: Corrects Job History entries that have UserRnd values did not clear if they subsequently fail to qualify for the select/deselect ToInvoice list.

9.1.611.059AVAb (2022-03-23)

Accounts Receivable 

Avalara: This update is designed to handle Avalara's returned errors in order to relay Avalara's error message back to the user. Users may bypass address validation by referring to Avalara documentation. In addition, this update contains a correction so the mentioned bypass correctly sends and receives data between SAMPro and Avalara.

9.1.611.059AVAa (2022-03-23)

Accounts Receivable 

Avalara: This update integrates the change quoting function to Avalara for Estimated Sales tax. 

9.1.611.059AVAa (2022-03-03)

Accounts Receivable 

Avalara: This update constructs a .Net WebAPI that implements the interface currently provided by the COM functionality. This requires Smalltalk changes to invoke the WebAPI methods instead of the COM methods. This has the added byproduct of allowing other Data-Basics products to implement the same integrations.

Avalara: This update integrates the change quoting function to Avalara for Estimated Sales tax. 

9.1.611.059 Revised Reports


W2 changes for 2021 - RPRCOVID-Report PR W-2 FFCRA Addendum
The W2 changes for 2021- Changes in this report include directions for 2021 Covid-related payroll for client use. Users should not allow Covid-related payroll for the last quarter of 2021. 

DAPPWPS Report Overlap on Total

This report fixes a feature when the Total Owed description and dollar amount overlapped when the value is too large.

9.1.611.059a (2022-03-16)

Invoicing 

Service Invoice:  Corrects Job History entries that have UserRn values did not clear if they subsequently fail to qualify for the select/deselect ToInvoice list.

9.1.611.059 (2022-01-20)

Job/Job Costing

Job Cost EOM: The release fixes the Job End of Month Processing function to limit the validation logic that ensures there are no running Invoices to the same criteria as the Job End of Month Processing function so that unrelated running Invoices do not block the EOM function.

System

Adobe PDF Printer: In this release, the Adobe PDF printer will not be displayed in the SAMPro printer list, whether or not it is the default printer. This is the new default behavior. This addresses an issue when customers receive an OS Error 16r6 when selecting "Adobe PDF" when printing. This is due to a new Adobe version update (released 1/12/22), resulting in a failure to post (e.g., Service Invoice) or other issues where a print confirmation is required.

9.1.611.059 (2022-01-05)

Client Order Processing

COP Customization: The updated customized v.cus now includes the PBBS page header for the COP Quote Report. This is available through our customized v.cus services.

Service Management

Work Order viewer: This update corrects security for intercompany IMH postings from WO Inventory when the location assigned to the WO Inventory does not belong to same company as the actual WO. 

9.1.611.059 (2021-12-30)

Accounts Receivable 

OpenEdge: This update corrects an error that added extra symbols in the zipcode after clicking Process Payment in the AR Cash Receipts. Before, it would replace the zipcode’s dash (“-“) with characters“%2D” instead. Locally solve this issue by clearing the cache/browser history. 
To clear cache and browser history:
1.    Go to internet settings
2.    Click Privacy and Security
3.    Click Clear browsing data
4.    Check the checkboxes for browsing history and cache images and files.
5.    Click Clear Data
Note: Clearing cache needs to be done after installation.

9.1.611.059 (2021-12-22)

Service Manager

Work Order viewer: This update adds a feature that alerts users when an inventory part is entered on WO and the amount entered causes that part to go into a negative on-hand count. Now when this happens, there’s a Warning displayed. 

System 

ReportAnywhere: This release corrects the problem with Report Trial Balance (a landscape-oriented system report) being emailed/saved as a portrait when run as a Scheduled Report. This fix prevents an orientation override for non-User Reports. 

9.1.611.059 (2021-12-16)

Service Manager

Work Order viewer: The Word Order Log tab is now sorted by most recent date/time logged; previously the sort was by oldest data/time logged first. This allows the user to see the most recent changes without having to scroll down to the bottom of the screen. 

9.1.611.059 (2021-12-15)

Clients, Site and Equipment 

Notes Viewer: This release supports the use of Common Phrases in the Notes viewer launched from a record. Commons Phrases may be added to the Notes field in the lower half of the screen by typing the Common Phrase Id and pressing Enter.

System

File Management Updates: Internal change to enhance performance saving files.

9.1.611.059 (2021-12-10)

Accounts Receivable

OpenEdge: This release allows a smoother procedure in OpenEdge Processing when the User Id contains a space. 

9.1.611.059 (2021-12-09)

Accounts Receivable 

Electronic Payments: When using Electronic Payments, Client Sites with special characters (&, characters with accent marks) in the Client Site name will no longer error during credit card processing.

Service Management

Create PM WOs: Corrects an issue where the Service Task list was not written to Work Order Equipment Work Requested if the Work Order Parts list did not reference any of Parts Types flagged in the Site Equipment PMSchedule. The Service Tasks will now be correctly written to the Work Order Equipment Work Requested (when enabled via registry) if no Service Parts are eligible.

Work Order Viewer: This enhancement improved the time required to open/load a work order in the Work Order Viewer by delaying the Gross Margin calculations until the Gross Margin tab is selected.

System 

Login Processing: In previous releases, the following registry setting was enabled to allow users to display a message allowing users to log on back onto SAMPro immediately after logging off, perhaps as a different user.  However, this registry was not working as intended, and was launching the incorrect SAMPro image from the v.exe file rather than via the startme.

Rather than implement a fix, the functionality was deemed unnecessary and this registry has been deprecated and removed from having any functionality.

ViewSQL: This release refines the SQL output display when the ViewSQL button is clicked.  The SQL display window can now be resized so that columns are not cut off. 

WebHelp: Previously for SAMPro WebHelp generated in a newer version of Robohelp, when clicking on the help option, the webhelp would be sent to the default web page instead of content-specific help. This issue was fixed so users are sent to specific WebHelp topic for the selected viewer or function.

9.1.611.059 (2021-11-24)

Accounts Payable

AP Aging: Resolved a very obscure issue that invoices with Unpaid “non-retainage” equaling Unpaid “retainage” would fail to qualify for the report and would thus throw total out of balance with G/L. Release date: 11-12-2021

Accounts Receivable

Client Site Viewer: In previous versions, failed payment alerts produced a long and vague notification. Payment failure now has a more specific error message. 

COP Registries

COP Invoices: AR Terms on COP invoice included a line for a discount. The wording is now optional and available but removed until added.  

DBAnalytics/KPI's

Alert When Opening Viewer from DBAnalytics: In previous releases, when two accounts were working on the same Work Order, saving would result in an error alert for another WO number. Now when two users are editing the same WO without saving changes, an alert prompts users to save work for the WO being edited. 

DashBoard Helper: In this release, the web session start code has been revised to make an assessment of currently occupied "ports" that fall within a Registry-defined "Port Range" so that an available port conforms to the range can be dynamically assigned.

Inventory 

IM Adjustments Journal viewer: In previous releases, the IM Adjustment Transaction Type did not require a “from” location and allowed data to be entered in the job or work order fields. The new release now requires the “from” location field to be completed and does not allow any data entered in the job or work order fields.

Invoicing

Next Invoice Stored Material: This field is used to record Stored Material for AIA Billing. Enter the desired amount to reflect on the AIA billing, and note that this value should also be encompassed in the Cntrct NxtInv amount for that particular bill item.  There is no functionality to "release" Stored Material values on subsequent invoices for that job; those values are adjusted manually by the user.  Specifying stored materials is simply telling the customer how much of the amount the user invoiced is stored materials. If users want to JUST bill for stored materials, ensure the next invoice amount and the stored materials amount are equal. Contact your Data-Basics Support Representative for details on invoicing formats to support this information.

Revised Report Service Invoice: These revised Service Invoice reports support the Bitmap Override by Dispatcher functionality. When printing Service Invoices, the system will look at the Client Site record referenced in the Work Order to find the Dispatch Id to check for an override id match. If it is referenced in the registry, the override bitmap will be used. If an override bitmap is NOT specified, the system will use the standard bitmap (Setting Key: bitmap) specified in the registry.

Job/ Job Cost

Job Billing Item CO/Request Viewers: For required fields for Job Billing Change Orders and Requests, users were able to bypass the required fields and save. The "required field" registries are now reading correctly, and users are no longer able to save or add without adding a field specified as required by the registry.

Job Cloning: Currently, users are alerted if they did not save. After the prompt, if they hit yes, required fields validation sets in. Then the required fields are necessary to complete before saving again.

Payroll

Compute Payroll: This release refines Compute Payroll processing to allow for negative earnings AND negative taxes (except for annualized taxes e.g. federal & state tables) when the following existing registry is set.

Compute OT: This release resolves a bug for users not assigned to ALL Group when creating a Labor Journal that would result in an error message.

Labor Journal Viewer: This release supports a registry-controlled emulation for including Earnings and Deduction Groups from the Employee Recurring Wages tab for Recurring Labor entries.

Payroll: Payroll 941S updated to support larger quarterly wage/tax amounts fields.Previously, Wages more than $9,999,999.99 in a quarter were subject to truncation, now support $99,999,999.99. Tax fields added another character of precision. Release date: 11-15-2021

Quoting

Quote Manager Viewer: In this release, clicking the revised Approve Options button displays the Approved Options wizard, so the user can select which eligible options (Open, Print or Accepted) to Approved.

Service Management

Work Order Viewer: In previous versions, Work Order COD did not have a functional option to store and use a credit card from the client site. Users can now use a payment alias or decline to use an alias and manually provide credit card numbers.

System

Cache SAMPro Working Directory: In previous releases, a select number of users were unable to convert a file to PDF or email a file with the message "Error: unable to access jar file". This release solves this issue by caching the SAMPro base directory at login so that SAMPro can always find the XmlToPdf.jar file. 

Quick Attach: In quick attach, the cancel alert said “file selection was cancelled. Please click Yes to continue.” The button said OK. Now it’s changed to “file selection was cancelled. Please click OK to continue.”

MessageBox Icons: In previous releases, many of our SAMPro message boxes used the Microsoft "Warning" Icon, when they were not actual warnings. In this release, the Microsoft "Information" Icon is used when appropriate.

Viewers (general): Users now have their user ID displayed on the SAMPro title bar. This is helpful for users to know which license they are using for SAMPro. 

Webhelp: Previously for SAMPro webhelp, when clicking on the help option, the webhelp would be sent to the default web instead of content-specific help. This issue was fixed so users are sent to specific webhelp.
 

9.1.611.058d+ (2021-12-30)

Accounts Receivable 

Cash Receipts Journal viewer– Electronic Payments: In previous releases, Custom Field details were only passed to USAePay when credit processing was executed from a work order.  In this release, these Custom Fields are passed to USAePay when possible on AR Cash Receipts Transactions:
•    The User Id and the Client Id are passed on every AR Cash Receipt transaction.  
•    If there is only one invoice in the ARCR, then the Invoice, Site and Work Order Id’s are included. 
•    When there are multiple invoices included in a Cash Receipt transaction, the word "multiple" is used. 
Note: This enhancement is supported for transactions when the Payment Alias is used as well as when card is manually entered.

Purchasing

PO Forms: A new runtime option, "Show Estimated Tax" has been added to the SAMPro Purchase Order. When this option is selected, the fields as defined below will display on the standard landscape Purchase Order. This will also be added to the Purchase Order when printed via the web (standard and SubPO) to ensure compatibility.  
If the Show Estimated Tax box is checked:

1. A line for "Subtotal" will label the current total value (without estimated Tax).

2. Added a new line for Estimated Tax.  
Important: The Estimated Tax will only appear on the PO if the Tax Group is completed in the PO header.

3. If the Show Estimated Tax box is selected, a line labeled "Grand Total" will also be printed. This is defined as the subtotal prices + total estimated taxes
NOTE: Portrait PO’s
If your system is set up to print SAMPro PO’s in portrait, the Show Estimated Tax option will appear, but will be ignored when the PO is run in this release.

9.1.611.058b (2021-11-08)

Accounts Payable

AP Payment Processing: This release includes reduces record locking issues when multiple users are processing AP Checks or running Date to Pay at the same time in a multi-company installation. See Customer Note 3.13 for details.

Accounts Receivable

AR Terms Viewer - Changed Field - Discount Percent: The AR Terms viewer now displays the Discount Percent as 000.00, but a registry is required to allow the decimal places to be set. See Customer Note 6.1.5 for details.

Clients, Sites and Equipment

Client Site Import: This release supports enhancements: using the Zip Code Table to set the Service Zone and Branch, using Avalara to set the Tax Group, and allowing existing Sites to be specified.  See Customer Note 2.6.1 for details / registries.

Start Merge Client Sites: This release supports the ability to merge Documents from the Site you are merging from to the Site you are merging into; see Customer Note 2.7 for details.  

DBAnalytics

Start DBAnalytics: See Customer Note 21.2.2 for a Registry Option to Specify a WebServer Port Range. This provides for easier setup and maintenance than dedicated port number assignment via User Registry and/or DB Registry settings.

Inventory

Inventory Item Location Tab:  To improve performance, the Average and Last Cost are now longer calculated on this tab and will display as "Needs Compute" until they are individually compute from the detail view. See Customer Note 5.4.2.a for a registry to restore the previous behavior to show the Average and Last Costs.

Start Import IM Adjustments: In this release, if there are failed transactions, the file containing those transactions will be emailed to the user defined via registry.  Previously, the file was saved and the location of the file was noted in the email.  See Customer Note 5.8 for details.

Invoicing

 

Service Invoice:

If Service Invoices will be auto-emailed or saved as PDF's, the user will be alerted if the Java runtime is not available, and will not be allowed to continue invoicing.

This release also corrects a sporadic issue when billing some PM Invoices which resulted in an "Attempt to update jchstry_rfrnce_ar_invce_id has failed. " error.

Revised Report: See Customer Note 9.2.1.o for details on the revised Service Invoice report (SERVICEINVOICE_v91b054.rpt) dated 2021-10-07 which saves in monthly folders to improve performance.  

Unit Price Scale Issues: This release prevents recomputed Unit Prices from having fractional pennies which could result in spurious lines appearing on an service invoice when they should have canceled out in Job History. This release also correctly recomputes Inventory lines based on the Material Markup table.

Job Costing

Job End of Month: In this release, the user is notified if anyone is invoicing work order or jobs when Job End of Month has started. A workspace message screen will then display the active invoicing details so that these other users can be alerted to complete their invoicing. See Customer Note 8.15 for details.

Payroll

Payroll Period:

Standard Costing: See Customer Note 12.1.22 for the registry and setup to designate a Payroll Period for use with Standard Costing only, evaluating only Earnings Ids types "Standard Cost" during Labor/WO Labor post.

Post History Button: When the Post History button is used, computed PR History errors will no long display on this viewer since the sort of errors noted in this process do not impact the ADP and other payroll services.

Compute Payroll: See Customer Note 12.1.11b for the refinement to a registry to Allow Negative Tax and Earnings to allow time coded to the wrong Job in a prior Payroll Period to be corrected so that the Local Tax allocation is correct.

Purchasing

Purchase Order List: A new sort order, PurchaseOrderByJobIDByDescription has been added.  The Job Id will only appear in the Job Id column if it is completed on the Purchase Order Main tab. No attempt is made to derive the Job Id from the Work Order (if completed) in the PO header.

Quoting

Quote Manager Approval Wizard:

New buttons, Select All and Unselect All, have been added to the Select Quote Documents Pane allow all listed documents to be selected or unselected.

This release corrects an issue where the Approval Wizard zeroed out the Estimated Labor Cost (for budgeting) when writing to an existing Work Order with an Employee Technician; see Customer Note 14.7.4.

Quote Scope: The Unit Price fields on the Inventory, Material, Subcontractor and Other tabs have been has been changed to two decimal points from four. See Customer Note 14.5.9 for details.  

Requisitioning

Start Fill Backorders:  A new range screen allows the user limit to this function to a selected location. This new behavior must be implemented by running the Start Function List Update. See Customer Note 18.7.

Service Management

Dispatch Board: The following statuses have been added to the 'uncompleted' filter:  parts pickup, parts backorder, parts issue, parts shipped.

Master Contract: Corrects a problem where, if the Time Of Service Earned box was checked but the Revenue as Percent box was blank, NO revenue adjustment was written to the Work Order. See Customer Note 16.5.4b for Recent TOS Updates

New Call:

Archived Work Orders (with a Status Category of Archived) are now excluded from the New Call WO list in SAMPro. This was done to improve the performance of New Call when displaying Sites with significant history. 

This release corrects an issue in the New Call registry (sys-start-snwcll) used to disable call sidebar buttons.

Work Order Viewer:

Equipment Tab: Corrects a spurious "Registry entry Error no such field exists" when right-click opening a list of Equipment. This release fixes the issue with registry entries for both required and disabled fields in all viewers.

Technician Tab: When the user adds a new Tech line, the New Call (sys-newcall) registry (if enabled) for DefaultStartTime and DefaultStartDate will now be used to provide a default start time / start date.

System

Positive Pay: See Customer Note 1.12.2a for a new, alternate format for Royal Bank of Canada: RBC0002.

XMLToPDF: See Customer Note 1.6.6 for information on a revised XMLtoPDF to correct an causing SAMPro to hang until Outlook is closed when UseOutlook is enabled the user click an E-Mail button in SAMPro when Outlook is not currently open/running.

Web Links: The user's default browser is now launched when opening Web Links from SAMPro, including the following:

Start DBAnalytics: The user's default browser is now launched when opening DBAnalytics from SAMPro.

WebHelp: In this release, SAMPro's WebHelp will launch using the user's default browser.  Previously, Internet Explorer (soon to be retired in 2022) was used for WebHelp.

XOi: The user's default browser is now used when opening an XOi link from the Work Order and Quote viewers.  

Credit Card Payment Links (OpenEdge/Global Payments and Electronic Payments): The user's default browser is launched when opening when a link to the credit card processor when adding an Alias or processing a payment manually  (Client Site, Master Contract, AR Cash Receipts, New Call, Work Order COD tab).

 

9.1.611.057b (2021-11-05)

Payroll

Start Generate Recurring Labor:  This release corrects a Trim Blanks" error if the registry setting detailed in Customer Note 12.1.15b is absent: the default will be 'never' to maintain previous default behavior.

9.1.611.057a (2021-08-11)

Accounts Payable

AP Manual Check (Single Write Check): This release implement Zero-$ check capability to the single-write (AP Manual) check function, as well as additional registry support. See Customer Note 3.2.16 for important details; a revised v.cus file is required.

Accounts Receivable

Electronic Payments Credit Card Payment Processing: Prevents the timeout loop from continuing if any result_code is received. Anything other than an A is now treated as an error.

DBAnalytics

Start Dashboard Post: This release corrects a CRMAnywhere issue where Quote scopes were unable to display. See Customer Note 21.4.1 for details.

Inventory

Inventory Receipt Journal: For the Custom EDI (Marketplace), this release corrects a problem with Ship Notice files being sent to the "Processed" folder before they had actually been processed.

Invoicing

Other Rate Viewer: The new References tab displays all Rate Schedules associated with this Other Rate. See Customer Note 9.6.7 for details.  

Service Invoice:

Compute Service Billing: Corrects an error occurred with Avalara Web for WOs with a PO# containing a backslash.

Service Invoice Report: The revised Service Invoice reports (SERVICEINVOICEv91b054.rpt and SERVICEINVOICEv90b028.rpt) dated 2021-07-15 adds FORMAT_CARMMU - to show cost & markup rate for lines - that are rate type markup.

Payroll

Labor Journal: This release corrects a validation error that did not allow the user to enter time if the primary Accounting Period was Inactive and but the Accrual Accounting Period was Active.  

Labor Journal Hours Tab - Bonus Accrual:  See Customer Note 12.4.1d for a simplified setup to ensure correct Bonus Accruals if the Employee Wages Tab includes no wages (typically used for union wage setups).

Labor Rate Viewer: The new References Tab displays all Rate Schedules associated with this Labor Rate. See Customer Note 12.23 for details.

Recurring Labor: See Customer Note 12.1.15b for details on a Labor Journal Registry to use the Earnings and Deduction Groups from the Employee Recurring Wages tab for Recurring Labor entries.

Project Management / Job Costing

Project Manager Workbench: See Customer Note 8.11.1a for revisions to the Contract Items Tab.

Job Viewer: Corrects an issue where the ChildTab registry option did not display all named tabs.

Reporting

Service Invoice and Other Reports: This release corrects a sporadic issue where report text boxes would split a word at the end of a line incorrectly instead of wrapping it. See Customer Note 1.3.10 for details.

Service Management

 Taylor UWO: See Customer Note 16.3.21 for additional Taylor Universal WO validations.

System

Revised XMLToPDF.jar File: See Customer Note 1.6.4 for a revised file that corrects an Email Address / Subject Concatenation Issue from Client Collections.

9.1.611.056b.a (2021-06-07)

Service Management

Master Contract: A new CSV button has been added to the side toolbar of the Sites child tab of the Master Contract Viewer.  It allows the user to add lines from a .cvs file to a brand new Master Contract record. See Customer Note 16.5.9 for details on the .csv file format.

9.1.611.056b (2021-05-10)

Accounts Payable

AP Vendor Date-to-Pay List (Select Invoices for Payment): See Customer Note 3.1.4a for a new registry option to require specifying the Company Id for this function.

Revised Reports - Unvouchered AP / InterCompany: See Customer Note 3.2.15 for details on revised reports that now evaluate security based on the Purchase Order header instead of IMH. This will prevent InterCompany PO's showing as unvouchered on these reports.

Accounts Receivable

AR Cash Receipts:

Other Tab: The use of AR Control Accounts is blocked on the Other tab. See Customer Note 6.3.7.

Electronic Payments: When the Payment Type ID field was required in the AR Cash Receipts Journal Viewer, an error could result upon processing with Electronic Payments.  This condition has been resolved.

 This new Client Site button launches the Start Alias Update function. This new function copies the Alias and Credit Cart information from the selected Site to other Sites sharing the same COP Client Id.  See Customer Note 6.8 for details.

Open Edge/Global Payments: If the merchant account is configured to allow it, card can be successfully processed (payment or alias) and get an Approval with an AVS or CSC error attached. SAMPro no longer treats these as failed transactions. See Customer Note 6.3.6a.

Report Customer Statements 3: This new report includes the customer's PO number (based on WO, Job or Client Order) on the detail lines. See Customer Note 6.2.8 for details.

Report AR Cash Receipts Journal Receipt: The revised report supports multiple applications to the same invoice on same day and additional refinements and other refinements. See Customer Note 6.2.6a.

Client Orders

Client Order: This release corrects a display issue where the Contract Id 'disappeared' when this field was set and the record saved. The Contact Id is now displayed correctly.

General Ledger / Bank Journals

Bank Transfer Journal - Intercompany Validation: When in Change/Save mode, A GL Entity revision is allowed but NOT if the edit would change the Company/Security established when the journal entry was initially created. This validation should prevent Intercompany OOB Company/Security posting.

GL Reporting: If UseCompanySpecificGLReportingPeriods is enabled, the GL Reporting Period will now be reset if the selected Company does not match the reporting period.

Inventory

Inventory Receipts Journal:

If the global registry InventoryCostIncludesTax is enabled, the system now correctly includes prepaid - use tax when calculating markup on General lines received in the Inventory Receipts Journal.

This release corrects an issue with missing revenue from PO-GEN lines on Job-based PO's. The Billable quantity is now set from the Job quantity received.

Prior to this correction, if a PO line description received an edit during Inventory Receipt Journal recording the quantity received evaluation could get confused and prevent "reversal" or undoing of the transaction.

The List button is disabled when the Inventory Receipt is accessed via the PO's Record Receipt TRX button. This validation prevents a runtime error when the Inventory Receipt is accessed in this special manner. In addition, the Inventory Receipt Id cannot be changed; the message "Cannot navigate to another Receipt record when receiving for PO" will be displayed instead of erring.  

Note that existing Inventory Receipts may now be accessed via double-click on the PO's IMH tab.

Invoicing

Progress Billing Posting Report: When posting an RININV3 job, the posting audit report now displays the GL Entity for the Retainage account used during the post.

Record Billing Adjustments:

This release corrects a rounding issue with submissions from DBAnalytics' Progress Manager's Workbench by always using the PMWB Submitted Next Invoice $ amount.
Negative retainage is calculated properly to prevent rounding issues.
Also corrects a sporadic Runtime Error "Key is Missing" related to secondary progress meters.

Service Invoice: Revised report dated 2021-04-06 corrects the "Unable to insert into Temp Table #woequipment" SQL error when invoicing work orders with lengthy Equipment Work Performed or Requested fields. Customer Note 9.2.1m.

Service Billing Worksheet: Revised report dated 2021-04-06 corrects the "Unable to insert into Temp Table #woequipment" SQL error when running report for work orders with lengthy Equipment Work Performed or Requested fields. Customer Note 9.2.1m.

Job Costing / Project Management

Report WIP Summary2(% Completion Method): Revised report corrects an issue where the report did not always match when running with and without the Billing Item Detail box checked. See Customer Note 8.2.7 for details.

Job Viewer

Job Cloning Buttons: Job Billing Items and Job Cost Codes flagged as 'Obsolete' will also be cloned if the Job is a true template (with the Template field flagged).  The list displayed when the Edit Billing Item and Cost Code buttons are clicked exclude records flagged as Obsolete. To display Obsolete records, click the Find Data button and clear the Obsolete range.

Job Cloning Buttons: The Job Clone Wizard now only clones obsolete Cost Codes and Billing Items associated with true Template Jobs. The list displayed when the Edit Billing Item and Cost Code buttons are clicked exclude records flagged as Obsolete. To also display Obsolete records, click the Find Data button and clear the Obsolete range.

Billing Items Tab: These new columns display values submitted from the Web PMWB: PM%Earned -  PM$Earned - 'PM$NextInv - PMStatus.

Project Manager Workbench - Contract items Tab: These new columns display values submitted from the Web PMWB: PM%Earned -  PM$Earned - 'PM$NextInv - PMStatus.

Start Job End-Of-Month Processing: This release supports changes in precision of decimals to match DBAnalytics. This change supports the broader objective to make % Completion Revenue audit-able and consistent with DBA: Job Performance.

Payroll

PR Export and ADP Export: This release corrects an issue with the calculation of negative reimbursements when using the Kaback / KabackADP format.

Report PR Certified Payroll -WHD: The revised report PR Certified Payroll corrects an issue where standard and OT hours were only displayed for the last employee listed; see Customer Note 12.2.25.

Report State Unemployment Electronic File: Revised report supports Colorado's revised quarter format. See Customer Note 12.2.26 for details.

Void PR Checks: This function checks to see if associated PRMD check(s) exist. The PRMD check number validation now includes checking both the GL Account and Entity to prevent false positive warnings.

Purchase Orders

Subcontractor PO's: This release correctly prevents PO level cancellation of the PO when a subcontractor line has been vouchered / partially vouchered. 

Purchase Order - IMH Tab: This release supports opening IMH record source (e.g., AP Journal, Inventory Receipts) listed on this tab. Double-click on a line to open the record.

Quoting

Quote Scope: This release does not allow Approved scopes to be deleted so that the link between the Quote and the Work Order is retained.

Reporting

Crystal Viewer: This release corrects a recent problem where the Crystal Viewer Web did not launch correctly if Chrome as the default web browser.

Service Management

Create PM WOs: Client Site WO Other lines are now applied to all applicable PM Work Orders when enabled via registry (see Customer Note 16.1.4b).

Dispatch Board Filter Tab: A status can be added to the Tech Status range by left-clicking on the Filter-By-Status Options list. Duplicated status are now removed from the Tech Status range when it is updated via left-click to prevent range issues.

Fleetmatics/Verizon Logging: This release disables all logging to the 'SQHelper.log' file to prevent a sproradic 'Runtime Error: FileSharingViolation' which was associated with the SQHelper.log file.

Map Id:

This release corrects an issue where the Map It functionality (located on the Client Site Main Tab and Work Order Log Tab detail view) that did not work correctly if a newer version of Chrome is the default browser.  If the Latitude and Longitude fields are completed, clicking this button once again launches Google Maps with the coordinates completed.

Report Service Recommendations: The revised report (RSRVCERCMMDTN.rpt) dated 2021-04-08 allows the entire contents of the Weblog's Work Requested to be printed instead of being truncated.

Work Order Daily Edit: The Refresh / Update button has been removed from the Checklist screen to prevent the "Adjust Current Field Not Understood" error.

Work Order COD Tab: If the new Open Edge payment processing is enabled via the global registry setting (OEDBX) and the user clicks the Process Payment button they may choose between using the Client Site Payment Alias or entering a new CC number and processing the payment (Customer Note 16.3.20).

System

Launching External Apps / Documents: This release improves SAMPro's ability to read and interpret Windows registries when opening Documents (such as .jpg and pdf files). See Customer Note 1.20 for details.

Ranges Saving and Messaging: This release supports internal improvements to the Ranges Table saving and messaging. If users at you firm have experienced issues with Ranges not saving properly, contact your Support Rep to discuss additional changes to the Ranges table.

Start Archive Record Change Log: This release supports internal changes to synchronize the Record Change Log and Archive tables to allow the function to run properly; see Customer Note 1.4 for details.

TechAnywhere

TechAnywhere Post: This release corrects a recent false negative error when posting to new Quotes: 'Unit Price must be zero for fixed price Options Codes - Posting to New Quotes has Failed'.

Override Job Cost Code: This release adds the ability (via registry) to specify a Job Cost Code to be used to override the Work Order Default Job Cost Code when the TechAnywhere posting service posts inventory line items to the WO Inventory child tab and to PO's. See Customer Note 19.1.6 for details.  

9.1.611.055a (2021-03-21)

 Accounts Payable

Select AP Invoices for Payment / Date to Pay: Corrects an issue where this function caused a record lock; the missing commit has been added.

Accounts Receivable

Electronic Payments USAepay Credit Card Processing: See Customer Note 6.7.6 for improvements in error processing and other enhancements.

Report AR Cash Receipts Journal Receipt: The revised report supports for credit memos. See Customer Note 6.2.6a.

Inventory

Inventory Adjustment Journal:

See Customer Note 5.1.1a  for a Registry to Error or Warn if a Completed or Cancelled Work Order is Selected.

This release supports adding Serial Numbers for Intercompany (where the "To" line's GL Entity is completed). See Customer Note 5.10.1 for the registry to enable and procedure to follow.

Invoicing

Service Invoice: This release supports the addition of a service invoice backer (typically for Terms and Conditions). The backer will appear at the end of the pdf'd invoice package. See Customer Note 9.2.1L for setup and registry details.

Payroll

Report PR Certified Payroll - PDF: This new report allows the user to automatically complete the WH-347 fillable form from the Department of Labor for weekly payroll. See Customer Note 12.2.23 for details. Setup help from Support is required.

Labor Journal: A negative Bonus now posts to the GL correctly:  Debit to Accrued Payroll and Credit to Expense. Computing Payroll relieves Accrued Payroll correctly for amount of Gross Wages including Credited Bonus. This allows the user to enter bonus line with a negative amount to account for having to reduce a salaried employee's gross pay.

Suppress SSN: A new option, Show SSN? has been added to selected Payroll Reports. When this box is blank, the report will hide all but the last 4 digits of the employee's Social Security Number. See Customer Note 12.2.24 for details.

Project Management / Job Costing

Project Manager Workbench: This release corrects an error encountered when a Gen tab PO had a unit cost over 999,999.99. This caused the MatPO tab to not populate.  

Report Change Order Request: The revised version of Report Change Order Request supports several bitmap overrides based on fields in the Job or Site. See Customer Note 8.12.3 for details.

Revenue Recalculations: When a Change Order Request approves or attaches as a Fixed Fee Change Order, any accumulated T&M revenue will receive offsetting postings. This also occurs for a formerly T&M Billing Item that gets edited into a Fixed Fee Billing item. See Customer Note 8.17 for details.

Quotes

Quote Manager:
This button launches a link to XOi's page, to display XOi "Jobs" linked to the selected Quote (these are not SAMPro Jobs). The 'full' XOi (contractor facing) content will be displayed. The user will be alerted if XOi is implemented but XOi "Jobs" are not associated with this Quote. If XOi is not implemented, nothing will happen when the button is clicked. This release also includes fixes to the SSCHelper initialization.

Report Quote Recap (Standard): Revised report supports Quotes with a total cost amount exceeding one million dollars. See Customer Note 14.2.2.

Client Order Processing

Release Recurring COP: Corrects the spurious "Warning: empty record being updated for table clntordrlst."

Client Order: This corrects an issue with filling B/O's and completing Client Orders in intercompany configurations.

Report COP Acknowledgement: This registry may be enabled to require that the user select a Company when printing this report so that the correct bitmap is used. See Customer Note 1.1.11.

Reporting

Registry to Require Company Selection: This registry may be enabled to require that the user select a Company when printing a report that does not include a print confirmation. This may be enabled to ensure that the correct bitmap is used on the report or for some other reason. See Customer Note 1.1.11.

Service Management

Dispatch Board: What begin it's corporate life as 'Sagequest' turned into Fleetmatics and is now Verizon Connect.  The button has been changed to reflect this, as have the mouse over and status pane references.

Master Contract:  Due to issues with scheduling / billing into coming years that are not leap years, February 29th may not be entered in the Adv. Bill or Schedule tabs, or the Master Contract saved with this date. See Customer Note 16.5.3 for details.

Work Order XOi Link: This release allows the user to view Public (customer facing) or Full (contractor facing) data from this link. Previously only Public content was displayed. This release also corrects a spurious 'A registry entry for payment process information has not been found' message.

System

Positive Pay: This release supports positive pay reporting for Ocean First Bank. See Customer Note 1.12.11.

Database Lock Recovery Dialog Box: In this release, the default is to not show the new box, but instead display the old record lock message box that only required the user to click OK. See Customer Note 1.9.1 for a registry to re-enable.

TechAnywhere

TechAnywhere Uploads: A document cannot be opened when it is pending the TechAnywhere upload. This release clarifies the message and provides a way to correct the problem: "This document has not finished uploading from TechAnywhere and is still Pending. Please have the technician complete the upload of the document with a manual sync in TechAnywhere."

9.1.611.054h (2021-03-10)

TechAnywhere

TechAnywhere Post: This patch corrects a recent issue where TechAnywhere collateral was not being attached to the Site.  This fix corrects an issue introduced early in version 9.1.611.054.

9.1.611.054g (2021-02-25)

Service Management

Reporting: This release corrects a "Runtime error: "useMasterContractEquipmentTable" not understood" experienced when running reports which reference Master Contract (including Report PM Billing List and Report PM Work Order List).  

9.1.611.054f (2021-02-23)

Payroll

Report PR Canadian T4s: Extends partial year reporting functionality (implemented via existing registry) to include special Covid 2020 report data in the printed and electronic reports.

9.1.611.054e (2021-02-17)

Accounts Receivable

OpenEdge / Global Payments: OpenEdge will be sunsetting their X-Web portal and requiring integrations to host their own portal proxy. This release supports the SAMPro DBXchange option, but the old X-Web portal will continue to be used by default See Customer Note 6.1.3 for important information on server setup, registry and user interface changes.

Client Order Processing

COP Pick Ticket Report: Corrects issue with missing column labels.

9.1.611.054d (2021-02-04)

Payroll

Report PR Canadian T4 Electronic: Fixes for non-intercompany; correctly sets company name and business number.

9.1.611.054c (2021-01-20)

Payroll

Report PR Canadian T4 Electronic: This release extends Covid19 reporting for 2020 to the electronic format. This is implemented with special, year-specific earnings processing. See Customer Note 12.2.22  for details.

9.1.611.054b (2021-01-13)

Accounts Payable

Revised Report AP 1099-MISC and NEC: For Tax Year 2020, the 1099 MISC will no longer be used to report information in Box 7 for Non Employee Compensation; it will continue to be used for reporting other information (along with other changes to the boxes listed on this form). See Customer Note 3.2.9b for important information. An electronic version of this report will be available shortly.

AP Journal:

Changed Field - PO: If multiple Inventory Receipt Journal (IRJ) entries are present, a list will appear when the PO is selected, allowing the user to choose All or a specify IRJ entry. In this release, the list box has been made wider to allow the user to view more of the information associated with the Inventory Receipt.

Changed Field - Due Date: This release corrects errors in computing the Due Date based on the AP Terms and the Invoice Date. See Customer Note 3.3.5 for details.

AP Terms: The AP Terms is now written to the Vendor Invoice whether it defaults in from the PO or is manually added or changed by the user. Updating the AP Terms in the APJ also successfully updates the Vendor Invoice.

Report EFT Accounts Payable: This release supports custom PaymodeX functionality. A registry setting plus special use of the Vendor User Fields is required. See Customer Note 3.2.5b for details.

Report T5018: The Canadian 5018 and 5018EF reports have been revised to use the Company record / Company Registry tab to specify the Company Name and Address and other registry settings required for these reports. See Customer Note 3.2.14 for details.

Vendor Viewer: This release corrects an issue on the Vendor Payments Tab where a voided check could show as the LastCheckNo. Voided checks are now excluded from this tab.

Accounts Receivable

Client Collections Screen: The Job Name has been added to the Payments Received pane at.

Revised Report Customer Statements: This revised report includes additional options and filters. See Customer Note 6.2.2c for detail and important note on running this as a scheduled report.

General Ledger

GL Journal

The new Import .CVS button supports the import of a file use to generate a GL Journal entry. See Customer Note 10.3.1 for details and the required .CSV file format.

Bank Reconciliation Journal - Registry to Auto Fill Checks as Not Cleared: See Customer Note 10.1.4.

Inventory

Inventory Adjustments Journal: Additional validation has been added to this viewer to prevent incorrectly entered 'Adjustment' transaction types from generating out of balance GL and/or Job History entries.

Invoicing

Progress Billing Post (Start Job Invoice Post):  When running in Intercompany mode, the system now validates that a Company has been selected from the list. Only invoices belonging to the selected Company are eligible for the post.

Service Invoice:

Revised Service Invoice / Service Invoice Post reports may be installed to prevent Out of Balance AR Sales Journal entries. See Customer Note 9.2.1k for details.  

This release provides a performance enhancement from the time 'Go' is clicked in on the ranges screen to when the Checklist appears. This is especially true for anyone in the habit of running Service Invoices unfiltered. 

Record Billing Adjustments: This release improves the performance of processing Jobs with invoicing data submitted via the PM Workbench analytic.

Payroll

Compute Overtime: See Customer note 12.1.21a for details on a Registry to Override the RegPayTypeId and OTPayTypeId settings base on Employee defaults.

Earnings Group: This release corrects a spurious 'Required Field: Earnings Id not filled in on Tab Earnings' message when the user attempted to delete an Earnings child line from the Earnings Group record.

Labor Journal: Additional validation in a previous release prevented users from fully accessing some previous entries because the validation was applied when changing focus from line to line. In this release, validation is only applied when the user changes a field, allowing earlier entries to be inspected.

Labor Journal Bonus: See Customer Note 12.4.1a for the Special Bonus Posting And Accrual Configuration (Union Wages) to use if an employee doesn’t get wages over and above the union wages (Earnings Group) specified in the Employee record's Default Tab.

PR Checks:

When a PR Check is auto-saved when printed, the Check document is now attached to the Check and Employee records - it was previously attached only to the Employee record in recent releases. 

*VOID* is once again printed in the signature field for non-MICR direct deposit checks.

Canadian PR T4 Reports:

These reports have been revised to use the Company record / Company Registry tab to specify the Company Name and Address and other registry settings. See Customer Note 12.2.16a for details.

This release also supports Covid 19 reporting for 2020. See Customer Note 12.2.16b for details.

Report PR W-2 Box 14 Covid Addendum: The IRS notes additional reporting requirements for the W-2. This specifies that employers either provide a statement with the W-2 specifying COVID related wages for 2020. See Customer Note 12.2.21 for details on the new Report PR W-2 Box 14 Covid Addendum which satisfies this requirement.

Project Management / Job Costing

Project Managers Workbench: The Purchase Order has been added as a column to the Cost Sources tab. If a Purchase Order is associated with a Cost Source in Job History it will be displayed in this column.

Report Jobs in Progress: The revised report (RJBPRGSS.rpt) dated 2020-11-10 or later includes changes to the standard Detail Line to present JobID and JobName as char(30) concatenation. This allows more of the Job Id to display; previously only the first 10 characters appeared.

Purchasing

Custom EDI: This release includes a registry that will add the LineItemPromiseDate tag to the items section the Marketplace PO.xml output file; see Customer Note 27.4b.

Quote

Quote Approval Wizard: A new field, Override Acct Mgr, has been added to the Select Work To Do Pane. If the Quote's Client Site specifies a Service Manager, that will default in when New WO and be used to populate the Work Order's Service Manager field. The user may also select a different Service Manager for the new Work Order.

Service Management

Create PM Billing Checklist: By default, the user is not allowed to deselect lines associated with Master Contracts. This change was made to prevent issues with Time of Service Earned and Billed Master Contracts being improperly billed / earned.  See Customer Note 16.1.4d for a registry to allow lines to be deselected.

Master Contract: This enhancement allows Site Equipment to be specifically associated with multiple Master Contract records by the addition of the new Master Contract Equipment table. This functionality allows a Master Contract to be 'cloned' with all of its equipment when the contract is renewed. See Customer Note 16.5.7 for details.

Report Refrigerant Usage: The revised Report Refrigerant Usage (RRFRGRNTUSGE.rpt) dated 2020-12-14 has been revamped to properly process multiple Refrigerant Tracking History events on a single Work Order.

Technician Remote Access Tab: The DBFleet Remote Device Type option supports a new TechAnywhere mode that only allows use of the DBFleet portion for GPS tracking and reporting to DBFleet. See Customer Note 16.16.4 for details.  

Technician Main Tab: The Email Fax and Email Address 2 field have been changed to Email to Text and Email2 to Text to reference their ability to send Texts through the Web Dispatch board. See Customer Note 16.16.1 for details.

Work Order COD Tab:

Previous validation logic associated with manually entered WO-COD lines used the Job's primary GL Entity instead of the A/R GL Entity. In this release, the Job's A/R GL Entity is defaulted first.

Checks applied to the Work Order COD tab from TechAnywhere no longer set the CC Trx field with the Check Number. After invoicing this resulted in Cash Receipts being ineligible for editing.

Work Order Build Invoice Description: A new registry that may be used to proceed the Work Performed for each Equipment line with Equipment Name, Manufacturer, Model and Serial Number. An option to also include the Components is also available. See Customer Note 16.1.8c for details.

Work Order Main Tab:  An Open XOi Vision Info link button has been added to the Work Order's Main tab. When clicked, this button will launch a link/URL to XOi's page, to display XOi "Jobs" linked to the selected Work Order. See Customer Note 16.3.7.2 for details.

System

All Viewers: Combined Add/Save Sidebar Button: In all previous versions of SAMPro, separate buttons were used to Add a new record or Change an existing record. This was useful for managing record cloning as the Add button would be enabled what a new record was started.  In this release, a single button will be used to save or add a record.  The addition of the + sign to the button when the record is in Add mode will provide a visual clue that a new record is being added while maintaining the standard usage of a single button for the Save process.

 

Icon

Function

Save existing record

Save (Add) new record

Save record disabled

 

DBAnalytics: Documents uploaded from the web products (DBAnalytics, FMAnywhere, CRM, Dispatch Board) that use the 'Start Dashboard Post' or 'Start NetFramework Post' functions, now have their appropriate web viewable flags set. 

Positive Pay (Univest): This release supports positive pay reporting for Univest Bank. See Customer Note 1.12.9.

Positive Pay: This release corrects an issue when an apostrophe in the Vendor Name was doubled for the HSBC, JPMorganChase and Mellon formats. The VOIDS HSBC Void Trailer Indicator field is also correctly set to VOIDS in this image.

Positive Pay (Signature): This release supports positive pay reporting for Signature Bank. See Customer Note 1.12.10.

AutoDocument Registry: The existing AutoDocumentAfterChange registry option may be enabled in viewer registries to automatically add a Note when a record is saved. Previously these Notes were set to Public by default, resulting in them being uploaded to Service Channel when certain records were saved.  In this release, the Notes default to Private when generated via this registry.

TechAnywhere

TechAnywhere Post: This release improves the overall posting of TechAnywhere performance by limiting the number of messages TechAnywhere posts per cycle. This may be refined via registry; see Customer Note 19.1.5 for details.  

TechAnywhere PO's: During purchase order creation from TechAnywhere, SAMPro now takes into account the bill quantity for both inventory and general items. This should correct posting issues to closed PO's for customers who are using COD Flat Rate and having techs create POs.
